statements: DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE company_name='ABC Company'
DELETE FROM WaterRegulations WHERE regulation_name = 'Clean Water Act';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM companies WHERE location = 'New York' AND contact_email = 'contact@example.com';
DELETE FROM penalties WHERE fine_amount >= 500.00 AND payment_status = 'Unpaid';
DELETE FROM compliance_requirements WHERE description = 'Regular Audit';
DELETE FROM compliance_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'Data Security' AND regulation_id IN (SELECT id FROM regulations WHERE primary_agency = 'FDA');
